What's New in DockFlow 1.40

  • Drag and Drop from Finder
    • Quickly build your DockFlow presets by dragging apps, folders, and files directly from Finder into the DockFlow UI
    • Seamless support for all item types: applications, folders, and files
    • Faster and more intuitive preset creation workflow
  • Menu Bar Icon Stability
    • Fixed a bug where the menu bar icon would shift position after relaunching DockFlow
    • The menu bar icon now remains in the same place for a consistent experience

Thank You!

We're excited to bring you these improvements and appreciate your feedback and support. Enjoy an even smoother DockFlow experience!
